page.title: 12RETIRED SCHOOL TEACHER
page.content: Has lived at Brancepeth all her life, and has taught at Brancepeth School for 25 years.She likes the countryside around Brandon and Brancepeth and hopes that no more houses will be built.When she started school in the village there were only 12 pupils and 2 teachers.Brancepeth school soon closed.Even today she sees very few young children in Brancepeth.Those that are young have no facilities. She would like to see the cricket field made into a playground.She likes to keep fit playing badminton which she does in the village hall.In her younger days she played for Durham County.Once everybody who lived in Brancepeth knew everybody else and worked on the estate,connected with castle.This has now changed with young people moving into the new houses.
